actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide a grant under the urban park and recreation recovery program to assist in the development of a Millennium Cultural Cooperative Park in Youngstown, Ohio.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant from funds made available to carry out the Urban Park and Recreation Recovery Act of 1978 to the Youngstown Playhouse of Youngstown, Ohio, for the development of a Millennium Cultural Cooperative Park.

titles.title: To provide a grant under the urban park and recreation recovery program to assist in the development of a Millennium Cultural Cooperative Park in Youngstown, Ohio.
